Having Steve Ballmer unveil the product is an indication of Steve Kraus 's strong ongoing commitment to Microsoft Dynamics as a product family and CRM as a specific application. The on-premises and partner-hosted versions of Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2011 will become globally available on February 28, 2011. This is the cloud-based version of Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2011, which will go head to head with other cloud-based CRM products from companies like Salesforce.com and Oracle. Sales professionals are at the heart of almost every successful business, said Steve Ballmer .`` Microsoft Dynamics CRM redefines productivity by offering an industry-leading product that is fully embracing the cloud.
